findings.title: Improper Access Control via Upgradable Contract Design
findings.description: The logic of the affected contract can be arbitrarily changed, allowing the proxy owner to perform malicious actions, e.g., stealing user funds anytime they want.
findings.location: DirectExchange contract, using the TransparentUpgradeableProxy contract at 0xE5FBcC78a113BaFDe9A93A3A23561CD6cBb3Ea39
